classic cookies.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
classic cookies.description: Soft and chewy cookies loaded with chunks of chocolate.

classic cookies.name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
classic cookies.description: Hearty cookies made with oats, raisins, and a hint of cinnamon.

classic cookies.name: Peanut Butter Cookies
classic cookies.description: Rich and nutty cookies with a crumbly texture, often topped with a chocolate kiss.

specialty cookies.name: Macarons
specialty cookies.description: Elegant French cookies with a delicate meringue shell and flavorful filling.

specialty cookies.name: Florentine Cookies
specialty cookies.description: Thin and crispy almond cookies topped with caramel and chocolate.

specialty cookies.name: Alfajores
specialty cookies.description: South American sandwich cookies filled with dulce de leche and rolled in coconut flakes.

shortbread cookies.name: Classic Shortbread
shortbread cookies.description: Buttery and crumbly cookies with a melt-in-your-mouth texture.

shortbread cookies.name: Lemon Shortbread
shortbread cookies.description: Shortbread cookies infused with lemon zest and drizzled with lemon icing.

shortbread cookies.name: Chocolate-Dipped Shortbread
shortbread cookies.description: Shortbread fingers dipped in rich dark or milk chocolate.

healthier cookies.name: Oatmeal Banana Cookies
healthier cookies.description: Soft and naturally sweetened cookies made with ripe bananas, oats, and a hint of cinnamon.

healthier cookies.name: Almond Flour Cookies
healthier cookies.description: Gluten-free cookies made with almond flour, honey, and dark chocolate chips.

healthier cookies.name: Vegan Peanut Butter Cookies
healthier cookies.description: Plant-based cookies made with peanut butter, maple syrup, and flax eggs.

testimonials.testimony: These cookies are absolutely delicious! I can't get enough of them.
testimonials.name: Emily Johnson

testimonials.testimony: The cookies were fantastic! My family loved them.
testimonials.name: John Smith

testimonials.testimony: Amazing cookies! They're perfect for any occasion.
testimonials.name: Sarah Thompson
